name: Water.org
impact: Nearly one billion people lack access to clean water, but thankfully $25 is all it takes for Water.org to provide someone with a lifetime of clean water. Your donation helps bring us one step closer to a world without thirst.
description: Provides safe water and sanitation solutions that give communities health, hope, and a future

name: Save the Children
impact: Your donation helps provide crisis relief, opportunities to learn, and a better future for children all across the globe! With your support, we can make sure every child receives the support they need to live a healthy and happy life.
description: Giving the world's children a healthy start, an opportunity to learn, and protection from harm

name: Room to Read
impact: Your donation will focus on literacy and gender inequality in education, two issues where Room to Read believes they can have the greatest impact. Nearly 23 million children have benefitted from Room to Read's efforts so far, and your support keeps that number growing!
description: Creating a future in which all the world's children can pursue a quality education

name: Educate!
impact:
Educate! prepares youth in Africa with the skills to succeed in today's economy.

Educate! tackles youth unemployment by partnering with youth, schools, and governments to design and deliver solutions that equip young people in Africa with the skills to attain further education, overcome gender inequities, start businesses, get jobs, and drive development in their communities. Its goal is to design skills-based education and employment solutions which impact youth life outcomes sustainably and at scale.

In 2019, Educate! partnered with the governments of Uganda, Rwanda, and Kenya and measurably impacted over 46,000 youth in and out of schools while reaching 470,000 learners more broadly, making them the biggest youth skills providers in East Africa. Amidst the coronavirus pandemic, Educate! has pivoted to create and deploy a distance learning model based on our proven in-school experience, and reached over 50,000 students by July 2020.
description: Preparing youth in Africa with the skills to succeed in today's economy

name: Human Rights Watch
impact: Wherever abuses of human rights exist, Human Rights Watch is there to give voice to the voiceless and power to the powerless. Right now, your donation is being used to expose police brutality, raise concern over the inhumane treatment of those with disabilities, and so much more.
description: An independent, international organization that defends the rights of people worldwide

name: Conservation International
impact: For more than 25 years, donations like yours have helped fund some of the most innovative solutions to the problems that threaten our planet. And as always, your donation will be matched dollar for dollar by the governments, foundations, and other donors that support Conservation International's work.
description: Because saving nature is the only way to save ourselves

name: Action Against Hunger
impact: Your donation helps move us one step closer to ending world hunger! Last year, Action Against Hunger reached more than 25 million people in 45+ countries through lifesaving programs that prevent and treat malnutrition, improve access to clean water, and more.
description: A global humanitarian organization committed to ending world hunger

name: The Foundation to Decrease Worldsuck
impact: Thanks for your donation! Check out projectforawesome.com to see where last year’s donations went and to help decide where this year’s should go!
description: Distributes 100% of donations to non-profits selected by Nerdfighteria and the Project for Awesome

name: GiveDirectly
imageCaption: A GiveDirectly recipient tends to his livestock in Kenya.
impact:
Thank you for giving directly. Your decision to send cash means poor families themselves will be empowered to prioritize their own needs.

Want to stay in the loop on what happens next? Join GiveDirectly's mailing list. GiveDirectly aims for a high bar on updates - content that will teach you something or leave you interested.

In the meantime, hear from ten randomly selected recipients who we recently enrolled (in their own words).
description: Offers a simple approach to addressing poverty: cut out intermediaries and allow poor families to decide for themselves what they need most.

name: The A21 Campaign
impact: Your donation will help A21 fight to abolish slavery from the world. Together, we are eradicating human trafficking through awareness, intervention, and aftercare.
description: Works to fight human trafficking and slavery.

name: World Wildlife Fund
impact: Your donation will help WWF protect our environment. Together, we are ensuring our habitat on Earth survives for generations to come.
description: Conserves nature and reduces the most pressing threats to the diversity of life on Earth.

name: Girls Not Brides
impact: Your donation will help Girls Not Brides bring child marriage to global attention, build an understanding of what it will take to end child marriage and call for the laws, policies and programs that will make a difference in the lives of millions of girls.
description: Works to end child marriage worldwide.

name: Cool Earth
impact: Together, we can help Cool Earth put in place the simple steps that change the fate of at-risk rainforest while empowering local communities. Thanks for your support!
description: Works alongside rainforest communities to halt deforestation

name: Friends with Four Paws
impact: Together, we can help Friends with Four Paws continue their work rescuing cats and dogs by finding them wonderful new homes. Thanks for your support!
description: Finds loving homes for cats and dogs

name: Sea Turtle Inc
impact: Together, we can help Sea Turtle Inc continue their work rescuing and rehabilitating injured sea turtles. Thanks for your support!
description: Rescues sea turtles and assists with marine conservation efforts

name: Against Malaria Foundation
impact: Together, we can help the Against Malaria Foundation continue their work protecting people from malaria. Thanks for your support!
description: Protects people from malaria through the purchase and distribution of nets

name: Sierra Club
impact: Together, we can help the Sierra Club continue their work protecting the environment. Thanks for your support!
description: Protects our natural landscapes and fights against climate change

name: The Rainforest Alliance
impact: Together, we can help the Rainforest Alliance continue their work of making sure environmentally-friendly, responsible business is the new normal. Thanks for your support!
description: Protects Earth's forests and climate through improving supply chains, advocating for policy change, and spreading sustainable agriculture practices

name: Australian Bushfire Emergency Relief
impact: With your help, the Australian Red Cross and the World Wildlife Foundation will work tirelessly to support the people, animals, and environment affected by these catastrophic megafires. Thanks for your support!
description: Responds to the Australian bushfire crisis

name: Earthjustice
impact: Together, we can help Earthjustice continue their work protecting the environment. Thanks for your support!
description: Earthjustice goes to court for the future of our planet

name: COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund
impact: With your help, the World Health Organization will continue to provide COVID-19 relief, prevention, and detection.
description: The fund enables all countries to prepare for and respond to the COVID-19 crisis

name: Doctors Without Borders
impact: Thanks for supporting the efforts of Doctors Without Borders in providing health services around the world.
description: Provides lifesaving medical humanitarian care

name: NAACP Legal Defense Fund
impact: Thanks for supporting the NAACP Legal Defense Fund’s fight for racial justice.

name: Equal Justice Initiative
impact: Thanks for supporting the fight for racial justice. Pictured here: the The National Memorial for Peace and Justice, the nation's first memorial dedicated to the legacy of enslaved Black people.
description: Works to end mass incarceration and confront racial and economic injustice

name: DirectRelief
impact: Working towards our goal of 8M hearts, we can help DirectRelief provide masks, medicine and other important resources to healthcare agencies and first responders combating the West Coast fires. Thank you for your support!
description: Equips doctors and nurses with life-saving medical resources to care for the world's most vulnerable people

name: Trees for the Future
impact: Every new tree planted makes a difference for our planet and farmers, every Heart donated makes a difference for Trees for the Future. Thank you for supporting this cause and promoting a sustainable future for us all!
description: Aims to end hunger and poverty by training farmers to regenerate their land

name: The Bail Project
impact: On behalf of the thousands of people whose lives have been restored through the presumption of innocence, thank you for donating to The Bail Project. Your gift will help The Bail Project to extend an immediate lifeline to low-income people who are legally presumed innocent, help them make their court dates and, through these efforts, demonstrate that the model of Community Release with Support is a more effective, humane, and equitable alternative to cash bail. In addition, because bail is returned at the end of a case, donations to The Bail Project’s National Revolving Bail Fund can be reused to pay bail two to three times per year, maximizing the impact of every dollar.
description: Combatting mass incarceration by disrupting the money bail system—one person at a time

name: Black Women’s Health Imperative
impact: Every Heart donated makes a difference for the programs supported through Black Women's Health Imperative! Thank you for supporting this cause and promoting a healthier future!

name: Asian Mental Health Collective
impact: Every Heart donated makes a difference for the programs supported through the Asian Mental Health Collective! Thank you for supporting the mission to de-stigmatize mental health support.

name: The Uyghur Human Rights Project
impact: Every Heart donated makes a difference for The Uyghur Human Rights Project and the people they advocate for! Thank you so much for making an impact.

name: CARE India
impact: Thanks for supporting CARE India! These funds raised will help provide medical equipment and access to temporary COVID-19 hospitals to those affected throughout India.

name: Trans Lifeline
impact:
Thanks for supporting Trans Lifeline! These funds raised will help connect trans people to the community support and resources they need to survive and thrive!

If you or someone you know could use support, please don’t hesitate to call:

US: (877)-565-8860

CANADA: (877)-330-6366

name: RAINN
impact:
Thanks for supporting RAINN! These funds raised will help ensure survivors of sexual assault are supported through local programs, a national hotline, and changes in legislation.

If you or someone you know need someone to talk to, call 800.656.HOPE (4673) to be connected with a trained staff member from your area.
